articles.title: Can we time travel? A theoretical physicist provides some answers - Phys.org
articles.description: Time travel makes regular appearances in popular culture, with innumerable time travel storylines in movies, television and literature. But it is a surprisingly old idea: one can argue that the Greek tragedy Oedipus Rex, written by Sophocles over 2,500 years …

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: WhatsApp now lets you transfer your chat history from Android to iPhone - The Verge
articles.description: WhatsApp is adding the ability to transfer your conversation history from Android to iPhone. It makes use of Apple’s Move to iOS app for Android, which can be activated during setup.
